text: The 2019 IHF Inter-Continental Trophy was the fourth edition of the competition held in Pristina, Kosovo from 10 to 14 April 2019. It featured a men's youth (U-19) tournament and a men's junior (U-21) tournament. ==Junior tournament== ===Qualified teams=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width=280|Confederation ! Dates ! Host ! Vacancies !
